channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazfit T-Rex 3 Pro : voilà une belle réduction pour cette rivale de la Fenix 8 de Garmin
item.description: Avec sa T-Rex 3 Pro, Amazfit propose une montre outdoor capable de rivaliser avec celles de Garmin. Notée 9/10 par nos soins, c'est un modèle que l'on recommande chaudement d'autant plus maintenant qu'elle passe de 399 euros à 379 euros.

item.title: 5 things businesses and users should remember when using AI chatbots
item.description: Businesses and users overlook hidden risks in chatbot conversations. These five reminders keep AI use safer.

item.title: Micron says memory shortage will ‘persist’ beyond 2026
item.description: Micron, one of the three biggest memory suppliers in the world, forecasts rough months ahead for the global RAM supply. As part of its earnings report released on Wednesday, Micron CEO Sanjay Mehrotra said "tight industry conditions" across DRAM and NAND flash memory are expected to "persist through and beyond" 2026 as AI drives up […]

item.title: Guerre contre les ransomwares : le FBI fait tomber un nouveau maillon clé de l’industrie criminelle
item.description: E-Note, un service de blanchiment de cryptomonnaies au cœur de l’écosystème criminel, vient d’être démantelé par les autorités américaines. Avant de fermer ses portes, il a permis de blanchir plus de 70 millions de dollars issus de cyberattaques.

item.title: Un milliardaire de SpaceX à la tête de la Nasa : la Chine va-t-elle prendre l'avantage ?
item.description: C'est désormais officiel, Jared Isaacman devient bel et bien le nouvel administrateur de la Nasa. Le milliardaire soutenu par Donald Trump avait déjà dévoilé quelques pistes à propos de sa vision de l'agence spatiale américaine.

item.title: Comment l’IA fait halluciner le monde de la recherche scientifique
item.description: Les hallucinations produites par l'intelligence artificielle pourraient conduire à une remise en cause de la légitimité de nombreux travaux de recherche.

item.title: Voici les premières photos volées du futur SUV électrique de Volkswagen basé sur l’ID. Polo : les Renault 4 et Peugeot 2008 en ligne de mire
item.description: Après des années de promesses, Volkswagen s'apprête enfin à lancer deux voitures électriques abordables. Le constructeur allemand a été surpris en plein développement de son ID. Cross, un petit SUV qui devrait rivaliser avec la Renault 4 E-Tech et le Ford Puma Gen-E dès fin 2026. Tarif de base annoncé : environ 28 000 euros, hors bonus écologique. ...

item.title: Auto giant LKQ says it's the latest firm to be hit by Oracle EBS data breach
item.description: Cl0p claimed to have breached LKQ, but the attack was confirmed only recently.

item.title: The Best Linen Sheets for Cool and Comfy Sleeping (2025)
item.description: Linen might not be your first choice for bedsheets, but it’s got enough benefits that it's worth a try. Here’s the linen we love sleeping on.

item.title: Apple opens up its App Store to competition in Japan
item.description: Epic Games CEO says Fortnite won't return to Japan, though, because the new rules still require high fees.

item.title: ‘All chaos and panic’: Nilay answers your burning Decoder questions
item.description: Welcome to our end-of-year Decoder special! Senior producers Kate Cox and Nick Statt here. We’ve had a big year, including nearly 100 episodes, a new YouTube channel, an ad-free podcast feed, and a slate of great guest hosts while Nilay was on parental leave. It’s been a lot. We’ve also had a lot of great […]

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Friday, December 19 (game #1425)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, December 19 (game #922)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Friday, December 19 (game #656)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Meetup's new mobile app is designed to make it easier to meet people IRL
item.description: If you're like me, it's probably been a hot minute since you’ve used or even thought of Meetup. Predating both Facebook and Twitter, the website, which was designed to help people organize in-person events, has changed hands a handful of times in recent years. In 2017, founder Scott Heiferman sold it to WeWork, which offloaded it a few years later before declaring bankruptcy in 2023. As of 2024, Bending Spoons, the Italian tech company that's probably best known for buying Evernote in 2022, has been running Meetup. In the aftermath of the pandemic, the platform has seen something of resurgence...

item.title: Trump Media is merging with fusion power company TAE Technologies in $6B+ deal
item.description: The merger would broaden Trump Media’s holdings into the nascent fusion power space while data centers clamor for more electricity amid the ongoing AI boom.

item.title: Luma releases a new AI model that lets users generate a video from a start and end frame
item.description: Luma AI's new model is available through the company's Dream Machine platform.

item.title: The best laptop deal right now isn’t from Dell or HP - it’s this $430 Intel i9-12900H beast
item.description: Core i9-12900H powered Hasee X5 15.6 laptop is just $429.99 - a massive $370 off its usual price.

item.title: Envie d’un Google Pixel 9a pour 40 euros ? C’est ce que propose Google pour certains clients
item.description: Entre offre de reprise exceptionnelle en raison d'un problème technique et promotion, certains utilisateurs de Google peuvent changer de smartphone pour moins de 40 euros.

item.title: 2026: A year of questions and a question of institutions
item.description: My annual look at the biggest trends of the coming year. Every year since 2010, I’ve posted an article about what trend I expect to dominate the next twelve months. Throughout the 2010s, these forecasts usually focused on emerging technologies or new currents in management thinking. But around 2020, that began to shift. The annual trends increasingly centered on how we cope with change rather than the change itself....

item.title: Taillé pour le gaming, cet excellent écran PC QD-OLED (165 Hz) de 32 pouces perd 350 € de son prix sur Amazon
item.description: L’écran PC MSI MAG 321UP s’adresse aux gamers les plus exigeants. Si ce dernier vous fait de l’œil depuis sa sortie, le voilà aujourd’hui à 599 euros contre 949 euros de base.

item.title: The best Christmas gift ideas everyone on your 2025 holiday shopping list will love
item.description: Finding the right gifts for everyone on your list this time of year can be a major source of stress. It can be even more daunting if you’re trying to stick to a budget all while getting the folks you love things that they will really appreciate. But there’s also a good chance you’re getting fed bad gift ideas (and just as bad deals) if you’re browsing the web frantically searching as we get closer and closer to the holidays.Allow us at Engadget to help you through it. Here, you’ll find all of our holiday gift guides collected in one place, so you can more easily find the best Christmas gifts y...

item.title: T-Mobile Says You Can Switch in Just 15 Minutes. I Tested That Claim
item.description: T-Mobile recently announced a new way to switch to the carrier in 15 minutes, and even get a new phone delivered on the same day. Here's what it's like.

item.title: Vibe-coding startup Lovable raises $330M at a $6.6B valuation
item.description: Lovable has seen its valuation more than triple just five months after the company's last funding round in July.

item.title: Vélo électrique Moustache : tout comprendre à la gamme et quel modèle choisir
item.description: Avec plus de 70 modèles au catalogue, Moustache propose des vélos électriques ciblant chacun un besoin spécifique. Voici notre guide pour comprendre leurs différences et bien choisir son VAE parmi cette offre pléthorique. Quel vélo électrique Moustache choisir ?

item.title: Nintendo préparerait des cartouches de Switch 2 avec moins de mémoire, mais pour quoi faire ?
item.description: Plusieurs sources affirment que des cartouches Switch 2 avec moins de 64 Go de stockage arrivent. Voyons quel serait leur intérêt.

item.title: New data shows that only 1.6 million units of video game hardware were sold in the US in November, making it the worst month since 1995
item.description: Video game hardware and physical software sales just had their worst November in the United States since 1995, despite the holiday season.

item.title: Don’t gift earbuds or headphones ‘til you read this! My job is testing audio – these are 6 best cheap buys for 2025
item.description: My pick of the 3 top headphones and 3 best earbuds to give as gifts this Holiday season; all TechRadar approved – and no product over $80

item.title: Fallout 5 will 'be existing in a world where the stories and events of the show happened or are happening', says Todd Howard
item.description: Todd Howard, director and executive producer at Bethesda Game Studios, has teased the next Fallout game, confirming that it will be impacted by Amazon's Fallout TV series.

item.title: Apple's Mac mini M4 is on sale for $479 right now
item.description: This time of year is not only a good time to save on gifts, but also to save on tech you may need (or want) for yourself. If you've been thinking about upgrading your computer, you can save right now on Apple's Mac mini M4. The desktop is down to $479, which is 20 percent off its usual price and the same low price we saw during Black Friday. Apple released the Mac mini M4 in late 2024 and we were impressed with how something so small could be so powerful. We gave it a 90 in our review, thanks to features like its speed and standard 16GB of RAM. The — currently — $479 base model also comes with...

item.title: CISA reveals warning on Asus software flaw, here's what you need to do to stay safe
item.description: A poisoned Asus utility tool was found floating around the web, granting attackers abilities to "perform unintended actions".

item.title: Psst, Oscar Voters: Guillermo del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’ Exhibit Is Coming to Hollywood
item.description: The horror master's passion project has such lavish production design, its relics literally belong in a museum.

item.title: 9 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find the ones worth your money.

item.title: Opposed to Data Centers? The Working Families Party Wants You to Run for Office
item.description: The influential progressive third party announced Thursday that it was putting out a recruitment call for candidates specifically opposed to data centers.

item.title: The latest iPad Air is $400 for the first time and arrives by Christmas
item.description: If you have $400 and want an iPad, your options are usually kind of limited to either just the base iPad, or better yet, the latest iPad Mini — if it happens to be on sale when you’re shopping (it is now, but that’s not always the case). But right now, you should consider getting […]

item.title: Amazon’s new Alexa+ feature adds conversational AI to Ring doorbells
item.description: Amazon said that the feature uses the Ring doorbell's video descriptions to determine who the person in front the camera is based on their uniform, actions, and what they are holding.

item.title: Your Ring doorbell can now use Alexa+ to identify who's calling and give them an appropriate greeting
item.description: Alexa+ Greetings can recognize and give instructions to delivery people, greet friends and family, and (politely) turn away cold callers.

item.title: I tested the Enlaps Tikee mini+ 4K timelapse camera – it’s a breeze to use, but the extra costs sure do add up
item.description: The Enlaps Tikee mini+ timelapse camera delivers fanatsic image quality alongside ease of use, all with an incredibly simple design.

item.title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS: Live tracker, best view time, NASA updates as object passes near Earth
item.description: The space object, which was only recently discovered by scientists, will pass closest to Earth on Friday, December 19. Here’s everything to know. Stargazers and scientists are getting a holiday present from the cosmos this week.

item.title: Meta just u-turned on the best VR announcement it ever made — and might have handed the win to Android XR
item.description: Meta has ‘paused’ third-party headset partnerships, which feels like a major win for Android XR.

item.title: Fuite massive de données à la CAF : les informations de 8,6 millions de Français compromises
item.description: Une fuite massive frappe la Caisse des Allocations Familiales (CAF). Des pirates ont pu exfiltrer plus de 22 millions de données personnelles. Plus de huit millions de Français seraient touchés. Les hackers du ministère de l'Intérieur sont bien décidés à montrer qu'ils ne plaisantent pas…

item.title: Segway e-scooters are under half price at Best Buy thanks to huge last-minute price cuts of up to $650
item.description: Best Buy's huge last-minute sale is offering some of the best price cuts we've seen all year on Segway e-scooters, with some deals under half price.

item.title: NVIDIA réduirait la production des RTX 50 : vers une nouvelle pénurie de cartes graphiques en 2026 ?
item.description: Les joueurs PC espéraient une accalmie, ils risquent de subir une nouvelle tempête. Selon plusieurs sources industrielles, NVIDIA prévoit de réduire drastiquement les livraisons de ses puces graphiques grand public dès le début de l'année prochaine.

item.title: Windows 11 : ces deux services plombent secrètement les performances de votre PC
item.description: Deux composants système de Windows 11 sont pointés du doigt pour leur impact négatif sur les performances.

item.title: 6 ways to uplug from the online world this holiday season
item.description: Here’s how to swap your phone for quality time with loved ones. The Christmas holiday season is a time to step back from the busy pace of modern life and connect with our nearest and dearest instead of screens, apps and chatbots.Here are some suggestions on how to unplug from the online world for the next few weeks as you sit down for a festive meal, exchange gifts or take time out for some self-reflection....

item.title: Pour Noël, Amazon déstocke le très bon OnePlus Nord CE5 à un prix inédit
item.description: Avec une fiche technique équilibrée et peu de compromis, le OnePlus Nord CE5 est un smartphone à considérer. Il a belles choses à offrir pour satisfaire la plupart des utilisateurs, le tout pour moins de 250 euros grâce à cette offre.

item.title: The best gifts for dads that have everything (but deserve more)
item.description: What do you get the man who says he has everything? It's a tough question - and one you have a limited amount of time to answer, given the holidays are nearly upon us. You could try dropping subtle hints or asking friends and family for suggestions, but they might save their best ideas for […]

item.title: Don’t eat this recalled dairy-free frozen dessert. It might have stones and hard objects mixed with cashews
item.description: Danone U.S. is warning customers about a potentially dangerous product from So Delicious. Here’s what to know. One of the best things about the Christmas period is all the yummy desserts found in people’s kitchens. But now one of the largest food companies in America is issuing a warning about one of those sweet treats.

item.title: OpenAI just launched an app store inside ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI has introduced an app directory that's now available right inside ChatGPT, the company announced. "Apps extend ChatGPT conversations by bringing in new context and letting users take action like order groceries, turn an outline into a slide deck or search for an apartment," the company wrote in a blog post. OpenAI also noted in a help document that "connector" apps like Google Drive are now simply called "apps." The new apps section (on iOS, Android and web) is divided into Feature, Lifestyle and Productivity categories, letting you connect to commonly used apps and sites like Booking.c...

item.title: 2025 was the beginning of the end of the TV brightness war
item.description: Much like the audio industry's compression-driven loudness war, which reached its distortion-fueled apex (and not the good kind) with Metallica's Death Magnetic in 2008, the television industry has been having its own battle the past couple of years: the brightness war. Sparked by the introduction of HDR and its higher brightness mastering levels, brands began […]...
